document.full_text: wall street ended a four-day rally with its worst session since august on wednesday and could suffer more losses in coming days as investors faced more signs the economic recovery is fading.
document.title: june starts ominously for teetering wall street
lines_and_colors: wall street ended a four-day rally with its worst session since august on wednesday and could suffer more losses in coming days as investors faced more signs the economic recovery is fading.
